content.text:
# 2026 South Carolina Commissioner of Agriculture election

The 2026 South Carolina Commissioner of Agriculture election will be held on November 3, 2026, to elect the South Carolina Commissioner of Agriculture. The primary election will be held on June 9. Incumbent commissioner Hugh Weathers is retiring.
Republican primary
Candidates
Declared
*Fred West, director of market development at the department of agriculture
Declined
*Hugh Weathers, incumbent commissioner
Endorsements
*Wes Climer, state senator from the 15th district (2016â€“present)
